# f5distributedcloud_service_mesh (Data Source)

The `f5distributedcloud_service_mesh` data source retrieves information about an existing service mesh.

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "f5distributedcloud_service_mesh" "example" {
  name      = "my-service-mesh"
  namespace = "my-namespace"
}

output "mesh_type" {
  value = data.f5distributedcloud_service_mesh.example.mesh_type
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the service mesh to look up.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the service mesh is located.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the service mesh.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the service mesh.
- `mesh_type` (String) Type of the service mesh.
